![demo](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/29136904/342766691-5ccfc513-665d-4231-9962-52443a00639c.gif?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..sQvPZ7pIRBhQodFBgUwnjrfjaRxYu77MJZNuXJtHjCo)

[Comet Notes](https://cometnotes.com/ "Comet Notes") is a note-taking app with [Nostr](https://nostr.com/ "Nostr") integration.

## Download

You can download the app from the [Comet Notes](https://cometnotes.com/ "Comet Notes") website.

You can also download Comet Notes by navigating to the [Releases](https://github.com/nodetec/comet/releases "Releases") page and clicking on the release you want to download.

## Contribute

To install the dependencies and start the app in development mode, run the following command:

```bash
wails3 dev
```
